#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;


int main()
{
   int n,m,i,t,cnt,l;
   int fnd;
   string s,s1,s2;
   cin>>t;
   while(t--){
    cin>>n>>s1;
    s.clear();
    for(i=1;i<=n;++i)
    {
      m=i;
      s2.clear();
      while(m){
        s2.push_back(m%10+48);
        m/=10;
      }
      reverse(s2.begin(),s2.end());
     s+=s2;
       }
    cnt=0;
    fnd = s.find(s1);
    l=s.length();
   while(fnd!=string::npos){
    cnt++;
    fnd = s.find(s1,fnd+1);
   }
   cout<<cnt<<endl;
   }
    return 0;
}
